Control.name: PasswordDoNotMatchValidationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='The details you have provided are invalid. Please re-enter and try again. ']

Control.name: UpdatedSettingsConfirmation
Control.xpath: //span[text()='Your Email Newsletter Settings have been updated']

Control.name: EmailAddressMustBeTheSameValidationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='The email address must be the same']

Control.name: CompanyPosition
Control.xpath: //span[contains(., 'Please select a position') and contains(@style, 'display: inline')]

Control.name: AddressFirstLineValidationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='You must enter the first line of your address']

Control.name: AddressSecondLineValidationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='You must enter the second line of your address']

Control.name: AddressValidationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='You must enter the first line of your address']

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: Email Format (Text version recommended for Lotus Notes and BlackBerry users)

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: The information you provide will be safeguarded by the Euromoney Institutional Investor PLC group, whose subsidiaries may use it to keep you informed of relevant products and services. We occasionally allow reputable companies outside Euromoney Institutional Investor PLC group to contact you with details of products which may be of interest to you. As an international group, we may transfer your data on a global basis for the purposes indicated above.

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: If you object to being contacted regarding other Euromoney products by email please tick

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: If you object to being contacted regarding other Euromoney products by telephone please tick

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: If you object to being contacted regarding other Euromoney products by fax please tick

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: If you do not object to being contacted by third parties please tick

Control.name: RegistrationSucceedMessage
Control.xpath: //p[contains(text(),'Thank you for registering for a free trial')]

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: Managing IP covers all aspects of IP law and practice, focusing on the business and practical issues of importance to IP owners.Online resources include regularly updated news and reports; interviews; surveys; in-depth features; special reports; and data. Coverage spans patents, trade marks, copyright, domain names and other areas of intellectual property.

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: Managing IP covers all aspects of IP law and practice, focusing on the business and practical issues of importance to IP owners.

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: Online resources include regularly updated news and reports; interviews; surveys; in-depth features; special reports; and data. Coverage spans patents, trade marks, copyright, domain names and other areas of intellectual property.

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: Tax (if applicable) will be added later

Attribute.name: innerText
Attribute.value: (See Contact Us for full staff contact information)

Control.name: AddCommentConfirmationMessage
Control.xpath: //span[text()='Thank you for your comments. Subject to approval, they will be published on the site shortly.']

Control.name: RegisterHereForAFreeTrial
Control.xpath: //h2[contains(text(),'Register here for your FREE 48 hour trial')]

Control.name: SuccessfulMessage
Control.xpath: //p[contains(text(), 'Thank you for setting up your online account for Euromoney Conferences.')]

Control.name: WarningMessage1
Control.xpath: //span[text()='You must enter a valid e-mail address'][1]

Control.name: WarningMessage2
Control.xpath: //span[text()='You must enter a valid e-mail address'][2]

Control.name: ErrorMessageIfPageIsNotDisplayed
Control.xpath: //*[contains(text(),'Sorry, we are experiencing some technical problems with the page you requested.') or contains(text(),'An error has occurred') or contains(text(),'The page cannot be displayed because an internal server error has occurred.') or contains(text(),'error')]

Control.name: IvalidInfoWarning
Control.xpath: //p[text()='Your order was declined. Please verify your information.']
